title: POCO M4 Pro 5G launched in India with Dimensity 810 SoC and a 5,000mAh battery
content:
After making its debut in Europe in November, the POCO M4 Pro 5G has now made its way to the Indian market. The latest budget-friendly offering from the Xiaomi sub-brand offers a solid hardware package at a competitive price. The POCO M4 Pro 5G offers notable improvements over its predecessor, including a better display, improved
